ad_context:
<展覽倒數最後四天>
一掬山水 Landscape between Our Hands
| 台灣 | 日本 | 泰國 | 香港 | 八人聯展
| Taiwan | Japan | Thailand | Hong Kong | Joint Exhibition

 一掬山水 進入最後一週，
真的捨不得，但也很開心，
在此謝謝所有參展的藝術家們，
謝謝你們帶來這麼精彩的作品。

這段時間，陸續傳來讓人開心的消息。
參展藝術家之一 黃歆淳，
榮獲 2025 苗栗國際陶瓷競賽 實用器皿組 銅獎。
這不只是她第一次入圍競賽，也是第一次獲獎，
真的替她感到開心與驕傲。

同時也恭喜來自泰國的 Eve Sukanjana Kanjanabat，
入選並參與日本金澤二十一世紀美術館
第六屆金澤工藝三年展的正式展出。
這對她來說，是一個長久以來的夢想，
也是一步一步走出來的路。

很開心，這些努力創作、認真生活的藝術家，
此刻都在 一掬山水 的展場裡，
讓我們可以這樣近距離地看見他們此刻的創作。

展覽只剩最後一週，
真的很希望你能來看看，
看看這八雙手，這些被端起來的小風景，
也看看這些正在被世界慢慢看見的創作。

謝謝你們一路的支持，
也歡迎你在最後這幾天走進來，
和我們一起，為這段展期畫上一個溫柔的句點。

Landscape between Our Hands is now in its final week,
and we feel both grateful and a little reluctant to say goodbye.
Our deepest thanks to all the participating artists
for bringing such beautiful and meaningful works into this space.

It truly means a lot to see these artists, 
who create with dedication and live with sincerity,
gathered here in the same exhibition.

We are thankful to be able to witness their work and their presence so closely at this moment.

The exhibition now enters its final week.
We sincerely hope you will come and visit,
to see these eight pairs of hands and the small landscapes they have lifted before us,
and to see these creations that are now slowly being seen by the world.

Thank you for all your support along the way.
You are warmly invited to visit us in these last few days,
and to be here with us as this exhibition comes to a gentle close.

加藤真美 Kato Mami 
羅士亷 Chris Lo
陳芳蘭 Fang-Lan Chen
黃美嫻 Yokky Wong
Eve/ Sukanjana Kanjanabat
梁慧思 Queenie Leung
